item.title: But, Why?
item.description: Hi, I’m Alex. You might have just read a bit about me or perhaps we’re about to chat and you want to find out more about who I am. At this point, the most common question I get is, “But, why?” On paper, it is not obvious why having been a strategy consultant and software developer I am now researching dementia using multi-omics and data science and looking to use this experience to build products that improve the diagnosis and treatment of neuropsychiatric disorders.
